content:
In this example, the constructor of the Plane class calls the constructor of its superclass Vehicle. You can only use super to access the members of the superclass inside the child class. If you use it from another class, it accesses the superclass of the other class.
This keyword also allows you to explicitly access the members of the superclass, for instance, in the case where there is a method with the same name in your class (overriding, ...).
Example :

If use anoth class , access superclass class . thi keyword also allow explicitli access member superclass , instanc , case method name class ( overrid , ... ) . exampl :
